DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety long-term ( approximately one year ) effectiveness Essure System Permanent Birth Control ESS505 device prevent pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: The Safety Effectiveness Essure ( Model ESS505 ) Device Prevent Pregnancy Women
DOC.detailed_description: This study previously post Conceptus , Inc. After acquire Conceptus , Inc. , Bayer sponsor trial .
DOC.criteria: Female age range 21 44 year Subjects seek permanent contraception Subjects body weight within range 40 136 kilogram ( 90300 pound ) Subjects willing accept risk pregnancy occur rely solely ESS505 contraception Subjects medical history physical examination indicate bilateral viable patent fallopian tubes Subjects able comply protocol require followup visit ( e.g. , 3 month clinic visit , 12month telephone interview ) Subjects provide write informed consent prior enrolment Subjects sufficient mental capability provide clinically relevant reliable feedback regard experience wear device Subjects agree anonymised personal data make available Study sponsor , requisite regional international regulatory body Subjects contraindication use describe ESS505 Instructions Use ( IFU ) Subjects know proximal tubal occlusion either fallopian tube Subjects undergone fallopian tube sterilization procedure Subjects diagnose unicornuate uterus Subjects diagnose endometrial myometrial pathology may prevent fallopian tube ostia assessment Subjects schedule undergo concomitant intrauterine procedure time ESS505 placement ; IUD removal consider concomitant procedure Subjects suspect confirm pregnant Subjects postpartum undergone pregnancy termination â‰¤6 week schedule ESS505 placement Subjects diagnose active upper low pelvic infection Subjects one contraindication use describe ESS505 IFU Subjects positive preprocedure pregnancy test
